nameOverride.description: [optional] Override release part of fully name, if not specified fullnameOverride value.

create.description: [optional] Specifies whether to create a service account, default is true.

annotations.description: [optional] Annotations to add to the service account, default is empty.

name.description: [optional] Specifies Service account name, default is empty. If not set and create is true, a name is generated using the fullname template.

antpickax.description: [optional] Common application settings for AntPickax products.

configDir.description: [optional] Configration directory path for AntPickax products, default is /etc/antpickax.

certPeriodYear.description: [optional] Period years for self signed certificates using in pods, default is 5(year).

clusterName.description: [optional] Specify a cluster name for K2HDKC, default is empty. If not set, a name is Release name(.Release.Name).

baseDomain.description: [optional] Specifies the base domain name for the k2hr3 cluster. The default is empty, if empty k8s.domain is used.

server.description: [optional] The setting for the servers of the K2HDKC cluster.

count.description: [optional] Specify the server count in K2HKDC cluster, default is 2.

port.description: [optional] Specify the port number for K2HDKC servers, default is 8020.

ctlport.description: [optional] Specify the control port number for K2HDKC servers, default is 8021.

slave.description: [optional] The setting for the slaves of the K2HDKC cluster.

count.description: [optional] Specify the slave count in K2HKDC cluster, default is 2.

ctlport.description: [optional] Specify the control port number for K2HDKC slaves, default is 8022.

image.description: [optional] Specifies the docker image for k2hdkc slave container. If empty, antpickax/k2hdkc:1.0.3 is set as default.

command.description: [optional] Specifies the command for k2hdkc slave container. If empty, /bin/sh is set as default.

args.description: [optional] Specifies the args for k2hdkc slave container. If empty, dbaas-k2hdkc-dummyslave.sh is set as default.

files.description: [optional] Specifies additional files in configmap. The files must be under chart directory, if not, could not load file contents.

expandFiles.description: [optional] Specifies additional files and its contents(string) in configmap. Each value must have key and content subkey.

contents.description: [required] Specify the file contents(string) to upload.

k2hr3.description: [optional] Settings for the K2HR3 system used by the K2HDKC cluster.

clusterName.description: [optional] Specify a cluster name for K2HR3 system, default is empty. If not set, a name is k2hr3.

baseDomain.description: [optional] Specifies the base domain name for the K2HR3 system, default is empty. If not set, it is set the domain name for K2HDKC cluster.

unscopedToken.description: [required] Specifies the Unscoped Token for K2HR3 system, this token is used for setting information for K2HDKC cluster.

api.description: [optional] The setting for the K2HR3 REST API in K2HR3 system.

baseName.description: [optional] Specify the base name for K2HR3 REST API, default is empty in which case r3api will be used.

intPort.description: [optional] Specify the internal port number for K2HR3 REST API slaves, default is 443.

images.description: [optional] Specify the organization and version of the image used by the pods deployed.

dkc.description: [optional] Specify the K2HDKC image organization and version.

organization.description: [optional] Specify the organaization for the K2HDKC image, default is empty in which case antpickax will be used.

version.description: [optional] Specify the version for the K2HDKC image, default is empty in which case one of version number will be used.

chmpx.description: [optional] Specify the CHMPX image organization and version.

organization.description: [optional] Specify the organaization for the CHMPX image, default is empty in which case antpickax will be used.

version.description: [optional] Specify the version for the CHMPX image, default is empty in which case one of version number will be used.

mountPoint.description: [optional] Specify the directory path in each pods to mount the configmap and secret.

configMap.description: [optional] Specify the directory path in each pods to mount the configmap, default is /configmap.

ca.description: [optional] Specify the directory path in each pods to mount the secret which has CA self signed certificates, default is /secret-ca.

k2hr3Token.description: [optional] Specify the directory path in each pods to mount the K2HR3 Unscoped Token file, default is /secret-k2hr3-token.

k8s.description: [optional] Set the information for the kubernetes cluster in which will be deployed the K2HDKC cluster.

namespace.description: [optional] Specify the kubernetes namespace to deploy K2HDKC cluster, default is empty. If not set, use Release.Namespace.

domain.description: [optional] Specify the domain name of the kubernetes cluster to deploy K2HDKC cluster, default is svc.cluster.local.

unconvertedFiles.description: [optional] Specify the files(unconverted) to be placed in configmap.

dbaas.description: [optional] Specify an array of files(unconverted) for K2HDKC cluster.

path.description: [required] Specify the path of the file to upload.
